title: Standards based replacement for Exchange scheduling?
summary: Mental note: Look into Jical, Java iCal Group Scheduler, as part of an Exchange replacement when the current server comes tumbling down when they try to upgrade it. Yeah, I know, it'll most likely be just fine. But I can dream.
content:
